params.sqlcmd: "INSERT INTO " +" T_DAILY_WORK_REPORT(\\"DAILY_WORK_REPORT_CTL_NO\\", \\"SEQ_NO\\", \\"PLANT_CD\\", \\"DAILY_WORK_REPORT_TYP\\", \\"USER_CD\\", \\"OPR_DATE\\", \\"WORK_SHIFT_CODE\\", \\"WS_CD\\", \\"START_TIME\\", \\"END_TIME\\", \\"OPR_TIME\\", \\"OPR_TYP\\", \\"UN_OPR_CAUSE_TYP\\", \\"UN_OPR_TIME\\", \\"REMARKS\\") " +"VALUES " +" (?, TO_NUMBER(?), ?, TO_NUMBER(?), ?, TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), ?)"
"SELECT " +" 1 " +"FROM " +" T_DAILY_WORK_REPORT " +"WHERE " +" DAILY_WORK_REPORT_TYP = 1 " +" AND OPR_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" AND WS_CD = ?"

"SELECT " +" 1 " +"FROM " +" T_DAILY_WORK_REPORT " +"WHERE " +" DAILY_WORK_REPORT_TYP = 1 " +" AND OPR_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" AND WS_CD = ? " +" AND USER_CD = ? " +" AND((? = 1 " +" AND(TO_NUMBER(START_TIME) >= TO_NUMBER(?) " +" OR TO_NUMBER(END_TIME) > TO_NUMBER(?) " +" OR TO_NUMBER(START_TIME) < TO_NUMBER(?) " +" OR TO_NUMBER(END_TIME) <= TO_NUMBER(?) " +" OR (TO_NUMBER(START_TIME) > TO_NUMBER(END_TIME) " +" AND TO_NUMBER(START_TIME) < TO_NUMBER(?) " +" AND TO_NUMBER(END_TIME) > TO_NUMBER(?)))) " +" OR (? = 2 " +" AND TO_NUMBER(START_TIME) > TO_NUMBER(END_TIME) " +" AND(TO_NUMBER(START_TIME) <= TO_NUMBER(?) " +" OR TO_NUMBER(START_TIME) < TO_NUMBER(?) " +" OR TO_NUMBER(END_TIME) > TO_NUMBER(?) " +" OR TO_NUMBER(END_TIME) >= TO_NUMBER(?))) " +" OR (? = 2 " +" AND TO_NUMBER(START_TIME) <= TO_NUMBER(END_TIME) " +" AND((TO_NUMBER(START_TIME) >= TO_NUMBER(?) " +" AND TO_NUMBER(START_TIME) < TO_NUMBER(?)) " +" OR (TO_NUMBER(END_TIME) > TO_NUMBER(?) " +" AND TO_NUMBER(END_TIME) <= TO_NUMBER(?)) " +" OR (TO_NUMBER(START_TIME) <= TO_NUMBER(?) " +" AND TO_NUMBER(END_TIME) >= TO_NUMBER(?)))))"

"SELECT " +" 1 " +"FROM " +" T_DAILY_WORK_REPORT " +"WHERE " +" USER_CD = ? " +" AND OPR_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" AND DAILY_WORK_REPORT_TYP = 2 " +" AND((1 = ? " +" AND(TO_NUMBER(START_TIME) >= TO_NUMBER(?) " +" OR TO_NUMBER(END_TIME) > TO_NUMBER(?) " +" OR TO_NUMBER(START_TIME) < TO_NUMBER(?) " +" OR TO_NUMBER(END_TIME) <= TO_NUMBER(?) " +" OR (TO_NUMBER(START_TIME) > TO_NUMBER(END_TIME) " +" AND TO_NUMBER(START_TIME) < TO_NUMBER(?) " +" AND TO_NUMBER(END_TIME) > TO_NUMBER(?)))) " +" OR (2 = ? " +" AND TO_NUMBER(START_TIME) > TO_NUMBER(END_TIME) " +" AND(TO_NUMBER(START_TIME) <= TO_NUMBER(?) " +" OR TO_NUMBER(START_TIME) < TO_NUMBER(?) " +" OR TO_NUMBER(END_TIME) > TO_NUMBER(?) " +" OR TO_NUMBER(END_TIME) >= TO_NUMBER(?))) " +" OR (2 = ? " +" AND TO_NUMBER(START_TIME) <= TO_NUMBER(END_TIME) " +" AND((TO_NUMBER(START_TIME) >= TO_NUMBER(?) " +" AND TO_NUMBER(START_TIME) < TO_NUMBER(?)) " +" OR (TO_NUMBER(END_TIME) > TO_NUMBER(?) " +" AND TO_NUMBER(END_TIME) <= TO_NUMBER(?)) " +" OR (TO_NUMBER(START_TIME) <= TO_NUMBER(?) " +" AND TO_NUMBER(END_TIME) >= TO_NUMBER(?)))))"

"SELECT " +" MC.CAL_DATE, " +" MC.HOLIDAY_FLG " +"FROM " +" M_CAL MC, " +" M_PLANT MP " +"WHERE " +" MP.PLANT_CD = ? " +" AND TO_DATE(MC.CAL_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" AND MP.CAL_NO = MC.CAL_NO"
"SELECT " +" NVL(SUM(NVL(OPR_TIME, 0)), 0) " +"FROM " +" T_DAILY_WORK_REPORT " +"WHERE " +" DAILY_WORK_REPORT_TYP = 2 " +" AND USER_CD = ? " +" AND OPR_DATE = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD')"
"SELECT " +" MW.WS_CD, " +" MP.PLANT_CD " +"FROM " +" M_WS MW, " +" M_PLANT MP " +"WHERE " +" MW.WS_CD = ? " +" AND MW.PLANT_CD = MP.PLANT_CD"
"SELECT " +" 1 " +"FROM " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_PROC TW, " +" M_PLANT MP " +"WHERE " +" TW.OPR_INST_CD = ? " +" AND TW.PLANT_CD = MP.PLANT_CD"

cell.name: DAILY_WORK_REPORT_DATA_TYP_NULL
cell.description: 作業日報データ区分がNULL
